name: places/ChIJb2t8kDRZwokRWl1IJb6vof4
adrFormatAddress: 870 7th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Fantastic performance by everyone!! I’m most impressed by the character Kitty Klipspringer played by Stephanie Cha. Kitty can sing, dance, play the piano, teach the crowd & command the theater. Also, she and Ms. Baker were the first to greet my friend and I standing idly. Having not read the Great Gatsby for a long time, I didn’t remember all the characters & I was very silly asking them if they were actors…AGHH. I KNOW. I thanked them for stopping by. Very immersive experience - all actors ran the extra mile trying to engage all the guests. There are side storylines happening simultaneously with small groups. As a military member, I could also relate to the historical context played vividly by Gatsby and Nick Carraway. I couldn’t have had a more immersive experience.

originalText.text: Fun immersive experience from The Great Gatsby. Bar, live show and full on entertainment. Loved it.

text.text: Fun immersive experience from The Great Gatsby. Bar, live show and full on entertainment. Loved it.

originalText.text:
Oh my goodness!!! This was probably the most fun I've ever had in New York, as a native New Yorker!

Just fantastic! The actors were excellent and very in character, the atmosphere was absolutely top notch, and the interactive aspect was definitely the best part.

The experience was 2.5 hours total, but it went by fast! There was a 15-minute intermission in between. The characters interact with you and bring you to behind the scene rooms that have a different story from the main ballroom.

At the end, there is also a mini-social where you get to take pictures and speak with the actors and actresses if you like! I got to speak with Daisy and Gatsby!

Know that this event is more fun with friends or a significant other. I went alone and it was a bit awkward. The drinks, alcoholic or not, were very expensive; be wary that they include tip! An "Old Sport Fashioned" cost, after tax and tip, $25+, and a soda costs $7 before any other fees.

None the less, a must, MUST attend despite the high cost! Definitely worth revisits, and I hope it stays open forever!

originalText.text: The show was amazing. Best immersion theater I’ve ever been too. The cast does an absolutely amazing job across the board especially those playing Gatsby, Nick, Daisy, and Jordan. The set design is absolutely wonderful and makes the world feel fully lived in. I’m definitely going again one day soon to try to pick up more storylines.

The set design is absolutely wonderful and makes the world feel fully lived in. I’m definitely going again one day soon to try to pick up more storylines.

originalText.text: A must see! One of the best plays I have ever seen, and you get to experience it with the actors whom are multi-talented. Join the fun and dress in 1920's attire. You will feel like you are at a great party.
